newsitem.title: USA: Kuhlman Corp says sold 2.3 shrs.
newsitem.headline: Kuhlman Corp says sold 2.3 shrs.

text.p: Kuhlman Corp said Friday it sold 2.3 million shares of common stock at a per share price to the public of $28-7/8.
In addition, the underwriters have the right under an over-allotment option to buy an additional 150,000 shares of common stock.

The company said the proceeds from the offering, which could be as much as $68 million if the over- allotment option is exercised, will be used to reduce outstanding debt that was incurred to fund its previous growth and acquisition activities.
In addition, the Company is using a portion of the proceeds to redeem warrants to buy 480,750 shares of common stock held by a former lender.
The managing underwriters of the offering are Robinson-Humphrey company Inc, Furman Selz LLC and PaineWebber Inc.
